name: Caspar
bio: Caspar, a seasoned tech executive, is the current CTO of Oost&Voort Inc. His 25-year career focuses on SaaS, Enterprise solutions, and DeFi among other areas. Caspar has been a significant figure in the Filipino blockchain community since 2017 and co-founded Blockdevs Asia. Currently, he's delving into Autonomous Worlds and Zero Knowledge Proofs with PixeLAW.
